senses.sense_definition: The official role, position, or responsibilities of a pastor.

examples.text: The old minister found his <w>pastorate</w> wearying and eventually decided to retire.
She felt called to enter the <w>pastorate</w> after years of serving as a lay leader.

senses.sense_definition: The specific period of time during which a pastor serves a congregation.

examples.text: His <w>pastorate</w> was marked by significant changes in church policy regarding community outreach.
During her ten-year <w>pastorate</w>, the congregation doubled in size and built a new hall.

senses.sense_definition: A collective group or body consisting of multiple pastors.

examples.text: The <w>pastorate</w> voted on new bylaws at the annual denominational conference.
Members of the local <w>pastorate</w> meet monthly to discuss shared community issues.
